trans-unit.source: Static DS Conversion Wizard
UID
PID
Title
Scope
Path
Usage
select/deselect all
Check data structure paths

The wizard checks if the data structure paths exist and are writeable. If a path does not exist, it attempts to create the necessary directory.

If you want to update your records, ensure you checked "staticDS.enable" before starting the wizard.
Convert existing data structures

This step copies your existing data structures into static files using the specified data structure paths. Static files that already exist will be overwritten.
Since the existing data structures remain unchanged, this is also an easy way to back up data structure records without actually using the static data structure functionality.

Are you sure you want to enable static data structures? This feature is experimental and it is recommended that you perform a database backup of all tables involved (pages, tt_content, tx_templavoilaplus_datastructure, and tx_templavoilaplus_tmplobj) before continuing.
Directory "%s" exists and is writable. Ready for usage.
Error: Directory "%s" could not be created or is not writable!
Setting: "%s" missing. Please check and update the existing configuration.
static DS Wizard - Step 1: Check paths
static DS Wizard - Step 2: Copy your existing data structures to files
static DS Wizard - Step 2: Update database records and enable static data structures
Update database records and enable static data structure
All tables were updated, Templavoil√† Plus now is ready to work with created static data structure files.
You have to clear the configuration cache for reading the new data structures!
